description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Play football with friends in your virtual games room. No friends? Then play against the computer.   Play one off Quick Games or compete against 16 other teams in a World Cup Tournament.  32 National Teams.  15 Built in formations or create your own to gain the extra edge. Play as male or female characters.
